Posts.Content: Cancer treatment is extremely profitable. There is no difference in long term survival among women who were randomly assigned to get chemotherapy, get chemotherapy and radiation ,or get neither.Chemotherapy may shrink your tumors but it does'nt cure your cancer.
Posts.Title: Radiation after breast cancer lumpectomy? 1 2

Posts.Content: Where is the scientific proof that one is more likely to be alive in ten years if they get chemotherary or radiation than if they don't get these "treatments"?I have read scientific journals . There is'nt any proof.Trust and faith are terms that are best saved for religion, not science ,even on Easter.
Posts.Title: Radiation after breast cancer lumpectomy? 1 2
